text.jpText:
『天皇賞（春）』の当日――
立ちはだかるのはスペシャルウィークだ。
text.enText:
On the day of the Tennou-sho (Spring), it
was Special Week who stood in her way.

text.jpText:
好走を続けるマンハッタンカフェだったが、
心が猛るほど体に負荷がかかり、
それが毒のように体を浸食し始めていた。
text.enText:
Manhattan Cafe had been running well, but
the more her mind raged, the more stressed
her body became, and it was beginning to eat
away at her like a poison.

text.jpText:
『お友だち』を追わせるのは正解なのか……。
彼女と交わした約束という縛りに、
ただ無事を祈ることしかできないのだった。
text.enText:
Is it right to make her chase after her
"friend"?… The promise I made to her
was a binding one, and all I could do was
pray for her safety.
